title: kaNNan mALigaikkE
sahitya:
kaNNan mALigaikkE marupaDi vandEnO kaN kaTTu viddai iduvO shen kamala


anupallavi

  viNNuyar gOpura vAyil dvArapAlakar viLangum garuDak-koDiyuDanE kATSi mighunda


caraNam    amalan vimalak-kaNNan tiu sEvaikku pinbu citta shramamE koNDengengO neDundUram shuTri shuTri
 kamalat-tEnuNDa vaNDU pOlE shuzhanru mINDum vimala dvArakai tANDa vazhi teriyAmal
